content.prompt:
Chazen Museum of Art

The female face in this Pwo mask from the Chokwe people is shown with closed eyes to represent the

choices.label: blindness of women toward evil spirits
fear of impending death that awaits all
ecstatic experience of the ritual overtaking the dancer

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
